00001 #ifndef _Key_t_hh_
00002 #define _Key_t_hh_
00003 
00004 #include <string>
00005 #include <cassert>
00006 
00007 namespace histmgr {
00008   template <typename T> class KeyMap_t;
00009 
00016   class Key_t
00017   {
00018     template <typename T> friend class KeyMap_t;
00019     friend class KeyMapBase_t;
00020   public:
00021     Key_t(const std::string &key_name) : _name(key_name),_id(invalidKey()) {
00022       assert ( !key_name.empty() );
00023     };
00024 
00025     Key_t() : _id(invalidKey()) { };
00026 
00027     std::string &nameStorage() {return _name;};
00028 
00029     const std::string &name() const {return _name;};
00030     unsigned int id() const {return _id;};
00031 
00032     bool isSet() const {return _id!=invalidKey();};
00033     
00034     static unsigned int invalidKey() {return static_cast<unsigned int>(-1);}
00035     
00036   protected:
00037     void cache(unsigned int id) const {_id=id;};
00038 
00039   private:
00040     std::string _name;
00041     mutable unsigned int _id;
00042   };
00043 }
00044 #endif
